channel.title: Pking help
channel.description:
This is kind of a [b]noob[b] question, but my server doesnt have pking. :eek:. I would like to know how to make a pking zone so if you die, you lose your items. But if you die anywhere else, you keep your items.
Thx ~artash~
YOU COULD BECOME MOD ON MY SERVER IF You HELP ME!
